attributes.action: Establish an Independent Inquiry into the leaking of emails and documents from Hadley/CRU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An inquiry to establish whether the scientists involved have (a) been manipulating the raw temperature figures to show a relentlessly rising global warming trend; (b) they have consistently refused outsiders access to the raw data; (c) have been trying to avoid freedom of information requests; and (d) have been discussing ways to prevent papers by dissenting scientists being published in learned journals.
